Cone_SteamLance.DescriptionRef: Generate purifying vapors, removing Weakened, Vulnerable, Brittle, and Plague from allies in a 15 degree, 13m long cone. Also heals (75 Qualifier) Vitality for 3 turns to allies and enemies damaged by healing, and deals 110% Water Damage to enemies. Source Infusions: 1: +15% damage (+2% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Create Blessed Steamclouds instead of mundane Steamclouds. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply Armor of Frost to allies affected for 3 turns. Gain an empowered Steam Lance skill that costs 3AP and can be cast until the end of your turn. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Heal 10% (+2% per Hydrosophist) missing Vitality and Armors. +40% damage (+4% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Empowered Steam Lance can now be cast for 3 turns. Allies within 13m of your target, who have at least 3 Hydrosophist try to cast Steam Lance on your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Hydrosophist while casting.

Cone_CorrosiveSpray.DescriptionRef: Conjure a torrent of acid, destroying (100% Damage) Physical Armor on characters in a 35 degree, 7m long cone. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Geomancer) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Geomancer): Apply Disintegrating: Physical 25% (+2.5% per Geomancer) until the end of your turn: The Disintegrating target suffers the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) again as Physical when Disintegrating expires. 3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Repeat base effects, with Physical damage instead. Apply Corroding for 2 turns. Recover 1SP.

Jump_TacticalRetreat.DescriptionRef: Apply Hasted to yourself, granting +1 Movement, +2 Start AP, and +2 AP Recovery, then teleport to target point. Jump_PhoenixDive.DescriptionRef: Hurtle down upon target point like a meteor, creating a 2m fire surface around your impact. Source Infusions: 1: Gain an Empowered Phoenix Dive spell that costs 1AP and can be cast until the end of your turn. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Empowered Phoenix Dive now costs 0AP and can be cast for another turn. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Cast an Earthquake that deals Physical damage when you land. Empowered Phoenix Dive can be cast for 3 turns. Allies within 13m of your target, who have at least 3 Geomancer or 3 Pyrokinetic try to cast Worm Tremor or Fireball (respectively, Worm Tremor takes priority) on your target as a free ritual reaction.

MultiStrike_BlinkStrike.DescriptionRef: Phase between enemies within 10m of your target, dealing 90% Weapon Damage to up to 2 characters. Source Infusions: 1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Warfare) and +15% damage (+3% per Warfare) while casting. Recover 1AP. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Gain an Empowered Blitz Attack spell that costs 1AP, strikes up to 3 targets, applies Bleeding for 2 turns, and can be cast until the end of your turn. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Empowered Blitz Attack can be cast for 3 turns. Allies within 13m who have the at least 1 Scoundrel or 1 Pyrokinetic try to cast Vault or Spontaneous Combustion (respectively, Vault takes priority, and is cast without teleporting) on the last enemy you strike as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Warfare while casting.

Projectile_IceFan.DescriptionRef: Hurl spears of ice at 3 target points, each dealing 50% Water Damage and creating ice surfaces in a 2m radius. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. +15% damage (+2% per Hydrosophist) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Fire an additional projectile at each target. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Fire an additional projectile at every enemy within 13m. Allies within 15m who have at least 3 Scoundrel or 1 Hydrosophist try to cast Fan of Knives or Ice Fan (respectively, Fan of Knives takes priority) as a free ritual reaction, at all visible enemies within 13m of them. For each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Hydrosophist while casting.

Projectile_DimensionalBolt.DescriptionRef: Fire a bolt of chaotic energy at target character, dealing 77% damage of a random type and creating a corresponding surface in a 1m radius. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Summoning) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Cast on other visible enemies within 13m that are standing in the same surface type as the original target. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Allies within 13m of your target who have at least 1 Warfare or 1 Scoundrel try to cast Bouncing Shield or Vault (respectively, Bouncing Shield takes priority, and Vault is cast without teleporting) at your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Summoning while casting. Pay 1 more AP: Cast again on all visible enemies within 13m.

Projectile_ChainLightning.DescriptionRef: Unleash a bolt of arcing lightning at target character that chains to up to 8 enemies in a 8m radius, dealing 130% Air Damage to each target. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Aerotheurge) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): +40% damage (+8% per Aerotheurge) while casting. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): Grants an empowered Chain Lightning spell that has a 1 turn cooldown and can be cast for 1 turn, but refreshes this duration when it is cast. For each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Aerotheurge while casting.

Projectile_LaunchOilBlob.DescriptionRef: Hurl an oleaginous bolt at a target point, dealing 70% Earth Damage in a 3m radius and summoning a Black Jelly. The Black Jelly deals Earth damage with melee attacks, casts Fossil Strike and Turn to Oil, creates oil surface in a 1m radius as it moves, and creates a 3m oil surface on death. Source Infusions: 1: Black Jelly's damage increased by 15% (+3% per Summoning). 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Upon death, Black Jelly repeats base effects twice, splitting into two which do not split further and do not count against your summon limit. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Jellies split once more. Jellies can now cast Catagenic Eruption.

Target_Bless.DescriptionRef: Apply Blessed to target character, granting +20% Accuracy, +10% Dodge, and +15% to elemental resistances. Alternately, target a surface or cloud and convert it to its blessed variant. If you target a character standing on a surface or in a cloud, that surface and cloud become blessed. Source Infusions: 1: Recover 3 AP. 2: Apply to all allies within 13m.

Target_TentacleLash.DescriptionRef: Transform your arm into a tentacle and flog target character, dealing 125% Physical Damage. Pay up to 4 more AP: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. Apply 1 Battered (+0.2 per Polymorph). 2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Failing to pay AP no longer applies Battered or Harried. +40% damage (+5% per Polymorph) while casting. Apply up to Subjugated II for 2 turns. Recover 1AP. 3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Apply 2 Battered (+0.3 per Polymorph). Gain an Empowered Tentacle Lash spell that has a 3m area of effect, applies 2 Battered, and has a 1 turn cooldown, for 3 turns.

Target_Harmony.DescriptionRef: Galvanize target character, healing (50 Qualifier) Vitality and (20 Qualifier) Magic Armor per allied character in a 5m radius around the target. Recover 1 SP.

Target_SoulMate.DescriptionRef: Apply Commune to target character, causing the affected character to receive an equivalent effect whenever your Vitality or Armor is restored or healed. Pay up to 3 more AP: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself. Cleanses Brittle, Charged, Ataxia, Vulnerable, and Terrified. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Failing to pay AP no longer applies Battered or Harried. Gain an Empowered Commune spell that can be cast until the end of your turn, and can only target your summons. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Empowered Commune can be cast for 3 turns. Recover 1SP.

Target_Challenge.DescriptionRef: Goad target enemy into a duel to the death over 3 turns: - You and your target receive bonus damage based on the opposite's Vitality, up to 50% damage at 100% Vitality. - If either of you die before Challenged expires, the other wins, is restored (200 Qualifier) Vitality, and receives +20% damage, (40 Qualifier) Armor and 40 for 2 turns. - If you perform an attack or skill during your turn that does not hit this target in some way, nor repositions you closer to this target, or the challenge expires, you lose and suffer 150% Piercing Damage. Source Infusions: 1: Apply Hasted to yourself for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Cast Battle Stomp at your target. Apply up to Terrified III for 3 turns. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Pay 2 more AP: Also mirror these effects for your target: at the start of each of your turns while Challenge is active, apply Disintegrating: Physical 20% (+2% per Warfare) to the opposing challenge target until the end of your turn. Disintegrating causes the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) as Physical when it expires.

Shout_AMER_Adaptation.DescriptionRef:
Your armor shifts and adapts to cover your weaknesses; activate Adaptation.
Convert up to 15% of your maximum Physical or Magic Armor to the opposite armor, until their current values equilibrate or reach their maximum; loss occurs from the higher of the two values and restoration occurs to the lower of the two values.
Adaptation is a power that can be augmented through the Ascension feature.

Shout_AMER_Enrage.DescriptionRef: Apply Berserk to yourself for 3 turns, silencing you, but causing you to inflict +1 stack of Battered or Harried whenever damage you deal causes either. Additionally, you suffer 1 stack of both Battered and Harried at the start of each turn. Removes Clear-Minded. These effects may be ended early by using this skill again with no Source Infusion. Source Infusions: 1: Grants Immunity to Subjugated, Terrified, and Slowed. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Grants +10% (+2% per Warfare) Lifesteal.

Target_DemonicBargain_Wealth.DescriptionRef: Exchange Vitality percentages with target character or non-totem summon. Target_AMER_Storm_Scourge.DescriptionRef: When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, 8 masses of carrion fall onto the 5m radius, preferring to directly strike characters once each - any remaining strikes occur randomly within the radius. Each strike deals 55% Physical Damage and applies up to Vulnerable II in a 1m radius. May be moved once each turn for 1AP. Source Infusions: 1: Drop a corpse at random within the area of effect. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Continue to drop one corpse when carrion is dropped each round. Dropped corpses now deal 2x damage within 1m of their impact. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): After casting, as a free ritual reaction, allies within 13m with at least 3 Necromancer try to cast Corpse Explosion on different unexploded corpses within the area of effect. For every two ritual participants, drop an additional corpse.

Target_AMER_Storm_Lightning.DescriptionRef: Conjure a blinding cloudburst that, when cast and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, causes 4 lightning bolts to strike onto the 5m radius, preferring to directly strike characters once each - any remaining strikes occur randomly within the radius. Each strike deals 70% Air Damage and applies Charged for 2 turns in a 2m radius. May be moved once each turn for 1AP. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): Lightning strikes apply up to Dazzled II for 2 turns. +2 lightning strikes. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): Before casting, teleport non-boss enemies within the target radius to positions nearest the center where they can stand. +2 lightning strikes.

Each strike deals 40% Water Damage, applies Brittle for 2 turns, and up to Squelched II for 2 turns, in a 2m radius. May be moved once each turn for 1AP. Ice shards now apply up to Squelched III for 2 turns. Recover 1SP.

Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.DescriptionRef: Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a 5m radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing 45% Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a 1m radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for (50 Qualifier) Vitality). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen. May be moved once each turn for 1AP. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): +3 strikes. Strikes now apply up to Terrified II for 2 turns. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Summon an Incarnate at target point and grant it Warp Infusion, it does not count against your summon limit.

Target_AMER_Acclimate.DescriptionRef: Target a surface in range, and apply the corresponding skin to yourself for 2 turns, which grants immunity to some statuses, +40% resistance to at least one element, -15% to another, and causes you to bleed surfaces. Water/Ice: Brittle immune, resist Water, weak to Fire, bleed ice. Fire: Scorched immune, resist Fire, weak to Water, bleed fire. Electrified: Charged immune, resist Air, weak to Earth, bleed electrified water. Oil/Poison: Calcifying/Poisoned immune, resist Earth/Poison, weak to Air, bleed poison. Source Infusions: 1: Grants +10% (+2% per Polymorph) resistance of the type chosen. 2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Grants 5% (+1% per Polymorph) maximum resistance of the type chosen. +1 turn duration. 3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Apply to all allies within 13m. Recover 1SP.

Target_AMER_Cryotherapy.DescriptionRef: Apply Brittle to enemies within target 3m radius, and create 2m ice surfaces beneath them. Then allies in this radius consume frozen surfaces within 2m of themselves, restoring up to (400 Qualifier) Magic Armor, based on the size of the surface consumed, and removing 2 stacks of Harried. Cleanses Scorched and Vulnerable. Source Infusions: 1: Allies are granted +5% to Elemental Resistances (+1% per Hydrosophist), and Immunity to Brittle for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply again to all characters within 13m. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Allies are granted +2% to Elemental Resistances per Hydrosophist. Recover 1SP.

Additional damage is instead 150% more.
